input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "JAXXON"
Reference Product Name: "14k Gold Cuban Link Chain - 8mm"
Reference Product Description:
Introducing our gold 8mm Stainless Steel Cuban Link Chain â€“ a statement of timeless elegance and enduring strength. Crafted with precision and exceptional resiliency, this chain is designed to withstand tarnishing, corrosion, and daily wear. Elevate your style with its bold 8mm gauge and classic Cuban link design, making it the perfect choice for both casual and formal occasions.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Miami Cuban Link Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON 3mm Cuban Link'
  - Name='JAXXON Cuban Chain Stack'
  - Name='JAXXON 10mm Iced Out Cuban Chain Set'
  - Name='JAXXON Cuban Link Silver Chain, 20"'
  - Name='JAXXON 8mm Cuban Link Gold Chain, 20"'
  - Name='JAXXON 3mm Solid Gold Cuban Link Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON 3mm Cuban Gold Chain Set'
  - Name='JAXXON 5mm Iced Out Cuban Gold Set'
  - Name='JAXXON 8mm Cuban Gold Set'
  - Name='JAXXON 10mm Cuban Link Gold Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON 5mm Cuban Link Gold Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON 10mm Iced Out Cuban Link Gold Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON 10mm Cuban Gold Chain Set'
  - Name='GLD Miami Cuban Chain Bundle'
  - Name='JAXXON 5mm Cuban Chain Set'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar product type with Cuban link, likely gold or similar chain; no size specified, so high relevancy but less precise.
Same brand and Cuban link style but smaller chain thickness (3mm vs 8mm); relevant but less similar in size and presence.
Same brand and chain style but likely a set or stacking pieces, not a single 8mm chain; less directly comparable.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 10mm Iced Out Cuban Chain Set
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand with Cuban link and similar but thicker (10mm) chain, plus iced out style; related but distinction in size and decoration lowers direct relevancy.
Same brand and Cuban link style but in silver instead of gold; similar construction and design, just different metal color.
Exact same brand, chain type, width (8mm), and gold color; essentially identical to reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 3mm Solid Gold Cuban Link Chain
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and solid gold Cuban link design but thinner (3mm vs 8mm); relevant but smaller gauge reduces equivalency.
Same brand and gold Cuban link style but smaller size (3mm) and part of a set; moderately relevant but less similar to single 8mm chain.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 5mm Iced Out Cuban Gold Set
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and Cuban gold style with 5mm thickness and iced out finish; related but smaller gauge and additional decoration mean moderate relevancy.
Same brand, Cuban link, and 8mm size in gold; as a set, might include multiple chains but closely related to single 8mm chain.
Same brand and style but thicker chain (10mm vs 8mm); highly relevant but slightly different size.
Same brand and style with gold Cuban link but thinner (5mm); relevant but different gauge.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 10mm Iced Out Cuban Link Gold Chain
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and gold Cuban link style but larger 10mm size and iced out design; related but differences in size and decoration lower score.
Same brand with gold Cuban link chains at 10mm thickness in a set; size differs slightly but very relevant.
Similar style (Miami Cuban link) but different brand and a bundle implies multiple pieces; relevant but not as close.
Same brand and Cuban style with 5mm thickness in a set; smaller size and multiple pieces reduce direct similarity.
